◆ CHECK_MALLOC

#define CHECK_MALLOC (   ptr)
Value:
if((ptr)==NULL) { \
BOV_ERROR_LOG(BOV_OUT_OF_MEM_ERROR, \
"Memory allocation failed"); \
exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
